subject: Re: New member here !!
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi Ralph... and welcome to the group!!!
And thanks for the "thanks".

Sorry you had to get caught by the "green wire" thing.  In most cases 
it is the green wire, as others have reported, but once-in-awhile it 
is found to be a different color.
That's why I went back and re-did the video to reflect that fact, 
saying you might want to lift the top board to ensure which wire it 
really is.  You may have seen the first edition of the video, which I 
hope) is off the internet now, unless someone copied it and posted it 
somewhere...???

Anyway... it sounds like you have much experience and lots to share 
with the group.  That's GREAT!

Once again, WELCOME!

- Mike




--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "ghostthostt" <Ralphsmi@...> wrote:
>
> Hi all,
> 
>  I'm a new member of the group and I am an Investigator of the 
> Paranormal here in central PA. My group's name is SPIRIT Paranormal 
> Investigation Team. I have been doing this in groups now for 6 
years.
> I had my own group H.I.P.S. (Harrisburg Independent Paranormal 
> Society) and now I am in the SPIRIT group out of Selinsgrove,PA. I 
> also use to be with Kelly Weaver's group Capital Ghost Forum which 
is

of

> Waverly Hills Sanatorium,Ky, Eastern State Pennitentiary in PA. I 
> have

> chance 
> to meet Bill Murphy here in Gettysburg,PA. on the Battlefield near 
> the 
> Wheatfield last year for a short time. He is a nice guy. I let him 
> listen to some of my EVP's from the Wheatfield and Triangular Field 
> that day we met. I have been called an " EVP Medium " by my peers. 
I 
> have a ton of them. I would like to thank "Frank Sumption" for his 
> inspiring work with his boxes and giving of his time and knowledge 
to 
> inspire us to do our own research to find the answers we are all 
> looking for in this world. Thanks, Frank for your inspiration and 
> hard 
> work we all appreciate it. I would also like to thank "Sum Duck" 
> and "Mike Coletta" for coming up with those Hacks that made it easy 
> for me and all the others out there that are Electronically 
> illiterate.
> Thank you guys we all appreciate it too. Oh well I just wanted to 
put 
> my two cents in to let you know I'm with you all. Oh, I have two 12-
> 469's the first one I broke trying to hack it LOL. The other one 
> works 
> great. I also have the 12-470(old model) which I tried to hack but 
I 
> cut the wrong wire. I cut the green wire (seventh wire from the top 
> as 
> Mike said to do)and when I put everything back together I had no AM 
> Band LOL. So I opened it up again and was thinking to myself should 
I 
> cut the wire before the green one I had cut or should I cut the 
wire 
> after the green one. Hmmmm, I thought here goes nothing so I cut 
the 
> yellow wire after the green one number eight from the top. I put it 
> together as I was crossing my fingers, I tried the FM band and 
bingo 
> it worked great. Just a funny story of how electronically 
illiterate 
> I 
> am. I do want to say I do hear alot of voices coming across these 
> boxes. I hear them saying their names and sometimes it sounds like 
> they are talking to each other. I have gotten answers to questions 
> too. Yesterday at my work place I like to listen to it while I'm 
> working here at the Post Office. I heard a male voice say to me "Do 
> you want a Tech ?" I also hear the name Lisa alot and they 
> say "seven" 
> alot too. My name has been called alot too. So there has to be 
> something to these boxes. Oh I also had one say " Hurry dead 
battery "
> which my batteries did die a few minutes later which was cool. I 
was 
> recording with my voice recorder and picked that up. They say some 
> funny things sometimes too. I did hear one say to me " F__k Off " I 
> know that wasn't on any radio program LOl. Oh well you have a great 
> set up here and it is nice to meet you all. Take care and keep up 
the 
> great work you all are doing in your researches. Bye for now !!
> 
> Regards,
> 
> Ralph Smith of "SPIRIT" Paranormal Investigation Team !!!!
